properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Commith thou all thy griefs And ways into His hands To His sure truth and tender care Who heaven and earth commands{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who points the clouds their course Whom winds and seas obey He shall direct thy wandering feet He shall prepare thy way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou on the Lord rely So safe shalt thou go on Fix on His work thy steadfast eye So shall thy work be done{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No profit canst thou gain By self consuming care To Him commend Thy cause His ear Attends the softest prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy everlasting truth Father Thy ceaseless love Sees all Thy Children's want And knows What best for each Will prove{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou everywhere Hast sway And all things serve Thy might Thy every act pure Blessing is Thy path unsullied light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When Thou arisest Lord What shall Thy work withstand Whate'er Thy children want Thou giv'st and who shall stay Thy hand{/lang-eng}
